node.detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，7 月 24 日出現症狀，8 月 3 日因發燒經急症室入住監察病房，同日接受病毒測試，其鼻咽抽取液及咽喉拭子樣本化驗結果為陰性，由於情況不穩定，8 月 4 日轉到深切治療部病房。因患者有喉嚨痛及腹瀉症狀，8 月 5 日被安排轉到監察病房再次作病毒化驗，當時結果為陰性，8 月 6 日因外科問題轉到普通外科病房繼續治療。患者由 8 月 6 日開始發燒，基於臨床決定，8 月 8 日被安排轉到監察病房並再次進行病毒化驗，最終化驗結果為陽性，隨即轉到隔離病房治療。
node.detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and developed symptoms on July 24. He was admitted to an observation ward through A&E upon developing fever on August 3, and his nasal and throat swaps tested negative on that day. He was transferred to intensive care unit due to unstable conditions on August 4, and then observation ward for re-test on August 5 due to his exhibiting sore throat and diarrhea, wherein he tested negative for the virus. He was transferred to a surgical ward on August 6 upon experiencing surgical issues, and developed fever on the same day. He was transferred to observation ward on August 8, tested positive for the virus, and was transferred to isolation ward for treatment.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en: In-hospital infections at Kwong Wah Hospital
groups.description_zh: 在 7 月 22 日至 8 月 9 日間有 6 名病人相繼確診，涉及三間病房。群組首名確診者最先於 7 月 22 日發病，初步相信該患者不合作，常除下口罩「大聲說話、鬧人」，過程中噴出帶病毒的空氣微粒，及群組其他患者轉房而引致引播。群組首 6 名患者已涉及 4 代傳播。
groups.description_en: Six patients from three wards at Kwong Wah Hospital were diagnosed positive for the virus between July 22 and August 9. The patient of the first confirmed case developed symptoms on July 22, who reportedly frequently 'talked loudly and told off people' with the mask off. It is believed that the virus-carrying air particles he emitted caused further spreading through patients being transferred to other wards. A fourth-degree transmission is identified within the first six confirmed cases.
